unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing with fresh launches faster than a Rajdhani Express!
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing with fresh launches faster than a Rajdhani Express!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped the new Scorpio N Adventure edition, promising a more rugged experience for your Ladakh trips. Expected to give Tata some serious competition.
normalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped the new Scorpio N Adventure edition, promising a more rugged experience for your Ladakh trips. Expected to give Tata some serious competition.

unnormalised: Then, Maruti Suzuki finally unveiled the much-awaited Jimny 5-door, perfect for navigating those crazy Delhi traffic jams, or maybe a weekend getaway to the hills.
normalised: Then, Maruti Suzuki finally unveiled the much-awaited Jimny five-door, perfect for navigating those crazy Delhi traffic jams, or maybe a weekend getaway to the hills.

unnormalised: Hyundai is rumored to be launching a Creta facelift next month, with whispers of some serious design tweaks and advanced tech. Think ADAS!
normalised: Hyundai is rumored to be launching a Creta facelift next month, with whispers of some serious design tweaks and advanced tech. Think A D A S!

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Tata is working on the Nexon EV facelift. They're aiming for a longer range; folks are saying around 450 km on a single charge.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Tata is working on the Nexon E V facelift. They're aiming for a longer range; folks are saying around four hundred and fifty kilometer on a single charge.

unnormalised: Dr. Rao, a well-known automotive analyst, reckons these launches will boost the sector by 15% this quarter.
normalised: Doctor Rao, a well-known automotive analyst, reckons these launches will boost the sector by fifteen percent this quarter.

unnormalised: The new showrooms are popping up like mushrooms after the monsoon. Average showroom size is now around 5,000 sq ft in Tier 1 cities.
normalised: The new showrooms are popping up like mushrooms after the monsoon. Average showroom size is now around five thousand square feet in Tier one cities.

unnormalised: Prices range from Rs. 8 Lakhs for the entry-level models to Rs. 25 Lakhs for the top-end variants. So, what are you waiting for? Go test drive 'em! Jai Hind!
normalised: Prices range from rupee eight lakh for the entry-level models to rupee twenty five lakh for the top-end variants. So, what are you waiting for? Go test drive 'em! Jai Hind!
